
                            
                            <p>大众点评APP点我的，看看有没有个达人笔记中心，里边随便发两个景点图，写15字以上的评论就能抽奖，一般都能抽到3，以后就不知道了 <br> 不过大概率也是几块钱，直接打款到绑定VX号。现在毛少且撸且珍惜 <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/26/135834s6hh1pyw8zp2n44d.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/26/135834s6hh1pyw8zp2n44d.jpg"> <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/26/135834naea70qn2kznz9m5.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/26/135834naea70qn2kznz9m5.jpg"> <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/26/135835uzgkgnxqkfhnwprf.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/26/135835uzgkgnxqkfhnwprf.jpg"> <br> 	    	     <br> </p>
